input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

product title:
Poster Magician pulling roses out of top hat surrounded by supernatural beings 1892

Product features:
Attractive Poster Reprint of magician pulling roses out of top hat surrounded by supernatural beings
Printed at 16 x 24 in.
HIgh quality, non-glossy photo paper
1892

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This attractive poster reproduction of a magician pulling roses out of top hat surrounded by supernatural beings is printed on high quality, non-glossy photo paper. The image measures 16x24 inches. This poster is a great addition to any magic or antique collection. It is also suitable for framing.
input_text.Response B:
Have you ever seen a magician perform a trick with flowers? This poster shows a magician pulling out a bouquet of roses from his top hat, surrounded by supernatural beings. This poster is sure to be a conversation starter in your office or home. Ideal gift for your loved one!

This poster is a high-quality print of the original artwork from 1892. Printed on archival, acid-free, thick paper with vibrant ink to last a lifetime. It's a great addition to any room or office.

The poster is 16 x 24 inches and fits perfectly in any standard-size frame. If you are looking for a unique gift for someone, this poster is a great choice.

The poster is printed with the highest quality ink and paper for a great finish. This poster will be a great addition to your home or office.
